page.title: 08More Local News
page.content: A new{Junior Youth Club}has started up, they meet every Friday night at the Youth Centre on{Spencer Drive}at 7pm till 9pm. There were two houses for sale in our area one at{5, Bosville {Close}at{Old Ravenfield,}a four bedroomed{detached}-house.The price is {Â£57,000}.The other house is at {31,Silvermoor Drive.} Its a three bedroomed{semi-detached}worth {Â£23,950. At{Micklebring,}which is in the N.E of our 'D'block in the summer,they get an{awful smell}of maggots from a{maggot farm.}Doncaster council are trying to close it down because of the complaints from people in Micklebring. A{coffee day}was held last Wednesday to help to raise funds for {St. James church}fund at 28 ,Moor Lane North Ravenfield, it raised{Â£75.
